description: Billy Santoro and Colby Jansen are hot lovers but there is just one problem…Billy is married! They just finished what we can only assume was a hot fuck fest when Billy tells Colby he has to get out before his wife comes home. Colby just didn’t get enough dick and ass and goes for round two. As they are going at it, Billy’s wife comes home early. Billy is pounded hard while his wife is just on the other side of the door!
title: Stealth Fuckers Part 1
